title: CONTAINS_IGNORE_CASE
description: Returns TRUE if the provided string contains any of the specified compare_strings, ignoring case differences. Otherwise, returns FALSE.

parameters.name: string
parameters.description: The source string to search within.

parameters.name: ...compare_strings
parameters.description: One or more strings to search for within the source string.

examples:
CONTAINS_IGNORE_CASE("Annual Financial Review 2024", "Annual", "financial")
-- Returns TRUE because "Annual" and "financial" are present in the text, regardless of case.

CONTAINS_IGNORE_CASE("Annual Financial Review 2024", "Annual", "2025")
-- Returns FALSE because "2025" is not present in the text.

IF(CONTAINS_IGNORE_CASE(Product_Type__c, "part"), "Parts", "Service")
-- Returns "Parts" if Product_Type__c contains "part" in any case; otherwise, returns "Service".
